data.actual_result: You can only scroll down to 100 users. (Can be shown in the video attached to the Trello card)
data.expected_result: You can scroll through +100 users, like you would with the member list.
data.short_description: Unable to view more than 100 Users in Reactions List
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a message that has over 100 users for reactions (Ghoul's post with 1000+ users from DDevs would be a good example.)- Hold the message, and click on Reactions.- Try to scroll down to see all of the users.
